title: Google\Cloud\Spanner\Admin\Database\V1\DatabaseRole
name: DatabaseRole
description:
A Cloud Spanner database role.

Generated from protobuf message google.spanner.admin.database.v1.DatabaseRole

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The name of the database role. Values are of the form projects/<project>/instances/<instance>/databases/<database>/databaseRoles/ {role}, where <role> is as specified in the CREATE ROLE DDL statement. This name can be passed to Get/Set IAMPolicy methods to identify the database role.
